title: The Hillman Group 70912 10 X 3/4-Inch Stainless Steel Pan Head Square Drive Sheet Metal Screw, 100-Pack
description: These sheet metal screws, or tapping screws, are highly versatile and are used to attached metal, wood, fiberglass and plastic. The sharp threads draw material together and ensure a secure hold. Sheet metal screws are fully threaded with a sharp point.
